text: @InspiringU2 Why would people listen to the recommendations by THE EXPERTS when @realDonaldTrump and @VP REFUSE to acknowledge they haven’t DEFEATED the COVID-19 virus and refuse to wear masks because of vanity, stupidity, and lack of feelings for others???
